content.rendered:
Directed by Per-Olav Sørensen. Hallgrim Haug

Written by Sven Carlsson. Sofie Forsman. Tove Forsman. Jonas Leijonhufvud. Christian Spurrier. Per-Olav Sørensen

Cast Severija Janusauskaite( Maxine6 episodes, 2022 ). Edvin Endre( Daniel Ek6 episodes, 2022 ). Gizem Erdogan( Petra Hansson6 episodes, 2022 ). Christian Hillborg( Martin Lorentzon6 episodes, 2022 ). Ulf Stenberg( Per Sundin6 episodes, 2022 ). Ella Rappich( Sophia Bendz6 episodes, 2022 ). Joel Lützow( Andreas Ehn6 episodes, 2022 ). Janice Kavander( Bobbie6 episodes, 2022 ). Jonatan Bökman( Gunnar Kreitz6 episodes, 2022 ). Lucas Serby( Mattias Arrelid6 episodes, 2022 ). Erik Norén( Niklas Ivarsson6 episodes, 2022 ). Rufus Glaser( Ludvig Strigeus5 episodes, 2022 ). Sofia Karemyr( Steffi4 episodes, 2022 ). Valter Skarsgård( Peter Sunde3 episodes, 2022 ). Fredrik Wagner( Mats Lundhom1 episode, 2022 ). Hanna Ardéhn( Lisa1 episode, 2022 ). Sam Hazeldine( Ken Parks1 episode, 2022 ). Patrick Baladi( Jim Anderson1 episode, 2022 ). Malin Barr( Aven1 episode, 2022 ). Agnes Kittelsen( Ann1 episode, 2022 ). Sandra Redlaff( Esther1 episode, 2022 ). Emma Suki(1 episode, 2022 ). Amy Deasismont( Nadia1 episode, 2022 ). John Carew( Anton1 episode, 2022 ). Felice Jankell( Sofia1 episode, 2022 ). Lisette Pagler( Karin1 episode, 2022 ). Nathalie Czarnecki( Tradedoubler receptionist1 episode, 2022 ). Christoffer Willén( Carl1 episode, 2022 ). Reuben Sallmander( Tom Holgersson1 episode, 2022 ). Isaura Barbé-Brown( Chantelle1 episode, 2022 ). Samuel Fröler( Pontén1 episode, 2022 ). Dionne Audain( Senator Madison Landy1 episode, 2022 ). Selma Modéer Wiking( Dancer1 episode, 2022 ). Tim Ahern( Senator Grayson West1 episode, 2022 ). Christian Arnold( Otto1 episode, 2022 ). Tekle Baroti( Receptionist1 episode, 2022 ). Kalled Mustonen( Steve1 episode, 2022 ). Renaida Braun( Ronda1 episode, 2022 ). Magnus Af Sandeberg( Reporter1 episode, 2022 ). Nicklas Hansson( Göran1 episode, 2022 ). Dan Lilja( Mattias Mischke1 episode, 2022 ). Pontus Olgrim( Barägaren1 episode, 2022 ). Thore Biselli( Gottfrid Swartholm1 episode, 2022 ). Ved Maddison( Bartender1 episode, 2022 ). Benjamin Löfquist( Fredrik Neij1 episode, 2022 ). Johan Eriksson( Polis1 episode, 2022 ). Christian Zea( Security Officer1 episode, 2022 )

Language Swedish. English

Producers Pierre Stein Bonnet. Luke Franklin. Eiffel Mattsson. Igor Nola. Peter Onsmark. Berna Levin

Production Banijay Group. Yellow Bird.

Certificate 15+

Official site Official Netflix

Season 1

Total Episodes 6
